settings.title: Glow for the Go

settings.popup_txt:
Rules: Winners will be randomly selected from all valid prize draw entries.

Introduction of the Event

The "Glow for the Go!" campaign ("campaign") and Lucky Draw ("Lucky Draw") are organized by Ulike and hosted on the Ulike website uk.ulike.com. The Campaign and Lucky Draw will commence on 16 October 2023 (GMT) and conclude on 12 November 2023 (GMT) ("Campaign Period"). Ulike reserves the right to shorten or extend the Campaign Period at its sole discretion without prior notice.

Eligibility

The Lucky Draw is open to all registered Ulike users on uk.ulike.com and de.ulike.com who are Europe citizens and 18 years old and above as of 9:00 on 16 October 2023 GMT) ("participant(s)").

Lucky Draw Mechanism

● The winners of the Lucky Draw will be randomly selected from all participants who purchase Ulike products from 16 October 2023 (GMT) to 12 November 2023 (GMT).
● All participants who purchase Ulike through the Ulike official website (uk.ulike.com and de.ulike.com) can participate in the Lucky Draw.
● The winners of the Lucky Draw will be announced daily on the campaign page.
● The winners will be randomly selected from all valid Lucky Draw entries.
● All winners will be notified via their registered email accounts. Participants must ensure that the details of their registrations are up-to-date, accurate, complete, and truthful in all respects.
● All winners are welcome to share valuable feedback through posts, pictures, and comments about our products.

Prize

The details of the prizes are as follows:

● 1st prize
LV Travel Bag × 4 winners (1 winners weekly)
● 2nd prize
Round Trip Air Ticket × 4 winners (1 winners weekly)
Three-Night Accommodation in Five-Star Hotels × 4 winners (1 winners weekly)
● 3rd prize
Sony Noise Canceling Headphones × 4 winners (1 winners weekly)
Polaroid Camera × 4 winners (1 winners weekly);
● 4rd prize
Ulike Air3 ( unlimited winners)
Ulike Air+ ( unlimited winners)
Coupon ( unlimited winners)
● The winners will be informed via email and text. The corresponding product will be sent out by Ulike as the said order is processed from 16 October 2023.
● Prizes are not transferable, or exchangeable for cash or any other item. In the event of a refund of the original order, the prize must be sent back together for the refund to be successfully processed.
● In the event that any prizes are awarded to a participant who has provided false or incorrect personal information, Ulike reserves the right to revoke the Participant's eligibility for the said prizes.
● The prize images presented in the campaign are solely for reference purposes, and the availability of the actual prizes may be subject to change. All prizes accompanying purchases during the campaign are non-refundable and non-exchangeable. In the event of a product return, the complimentary prize must be returned along with the purchased item. Failure to return the prize will result in a deduction of the corresponding gift value (£80) from the refund amount.
● Participants in the campaign agree to be bound by the terms and conditions set forth herein and understand that Ulike's decisions are final and binding. No correspondence or appeals will be entertained. Ulike reserves the right to make the final and ultimate interpretation of this campaign.
● Ulike will not assume responsibility for late entries which may occur for any reason, including but not limited to network transmission failure.
● Ulike will not be responsible for any direct or indirect losses or damages incurred by any party, including the participants, in connection with, or arising from acts or omissions, or any way related to this campaign.
● Participants further agree to release and discharge any third party related to or connected with this campaign from any liabilities and claims, including breach of contract, tort, negligence, or any other cause of action at law or equity, arising out of, or in any way connected to this campaign, or the participant's entry into the campaign.
● If participants are found to be using or have used inappropriate means to participate in this campaign, Ulike reserves the right to disqualify the participant's eligibility, including, without hesitation, the commencement of legal proceedings to the full extent of the applicable laws.
● Ulike reserves the right to modify and/or cancel the terms and conditions herein at any time at its sole discretion.
● This Campaign and the terms and conditions herein shall be governed by the laws of the country.

settings.title: Ulike Air3
settings.heading: Clinical-Grade Hair Removal at Home
settings.image_2_heading: Advanced IPL tech for a cooling sensation on the skin
settings.image_3_heading: Smooth skin that’s here to stay

settings.title: 3 Week Visible Hair Reduction, From Head To Toe
settings.content: Get skin-ready for your year-end trip with the Sapphire Air3 IPL Hair Removal device. Ulike Air3 gives you painless, visible results in just 3 weeks. Three power modes help you personalize your hair removal based on different treatment locations.

settings.title: Enhanced Ice Cooling for Ultimate Comfort
settings.content: Discover the next level of comfort with our advanced Sapphire ice cooling technology. Our upgraded patented quadro-cooling system lowers the skin temperature to 10℃, providing a refreshing and cozy hair removal experience.

settings.title: Effortless Hair Removal, Lightning Fast
settings.content: New Thumb-free Auto Flash feature – no more finger pressing needed! With an impressive flash speed of 0.7 seconds, you can achieve full-body hair removal in just 12 minutes.

settings.result_note: *The specific results vary from person to person, and the use time can be extended according to the thickness of the hair until the desired results are achieved
settings.result_content:
In less than 3 weeks of consistent treatments, you'll begin to see visible hair growth reduction.

*3 treatments per week

settings.result_note: *The specific results vary from person to person, and the use time can be extended according to the thickness of the hair until the desired results are achieved
settings.result_content:
After 6 weeks of consistent bi-weekly treatments, the hair follicles start to shrink and the hair root begins to fall out.

*2 treatments per week

settings.result_note: *The specific results vary from person to person, and the use time can be extended according to the thickness of the hair until the desired results are achieved
settings.result_content:
Most people will have achieved desired results by this stage, with skin becoming smooth and hair-free.

*1-2 monthly maintenance treatments

settings.title: No Pain, All the Gain
settings.content: Ulike's first product harnessing the clinical-grade patented sapphire ice-touch technology. With the treatment temperature reduced from 70℃ to 10℃, experience a hair removal process that's truly pain-free and proven effective.

settings.title: Cheaper than Shaving, Effective like Laser
settings.content: Choose Ulike IPL for a more cost-effective hair removal option and make your time more meaningful.

settings.title: Cassandra Bankson
settings.content: Going to a professional clinic for hair removal can be time-consuming, which is why I prefer conducting my own sessions at home using an IPL device.

settings.title: Dr. Anthony Youn
settings.content: With the same technology as laser, Ulike makes it easy for you to do your own IPL hair removal at home without spending thousands of dollars and multiple trips to the skin office.

settings.title: Alexandras Girly Talk
settings.content: The Ulike is designed to be easier to clean than the Braun. Both are great products, but Ulike's auto glide mode is more convenient.

settings.title: Dr. Gary Linkov
settings.content: Ulike's products have several international certifications and are safe enough for the skin. You can totally achieve full body hair removal on your own with ease.

settings.title: Amber Scholl
settings.content: IPL technology is very close to laser, but instead of going to a salon, you can do your hair removal at home. If you're going to the beach, then you definitely need it.

settings.title: Endorsed by Influencers and Medical Experts
Certified As Skin-Safe Technology
settings.sub: Ulike IPL is backed by over 30+ safety certifications, ensuring your skin is protected from harmful UV light, and delivering you a comfortable and reliable hair removal experience.

settings.title: Here Are Some Other Reasons To Shop Now
WHY CHOOSE IPL TECHNOLOGY FOR HAIR REMOVAL?
settings.answer:
IPL is a type of FDA-cleared light treatment that uses strong pulses of a broad spectrum of polychromatic light to target the melanin in hair follicles to achieve permanent hair removal results.

As the pigment absorbs light, it gets heated up and destroyed. Hair will grow back more sparsely and slower after each treatment, permanently reducing hair growth.

settings.title: HOW FREQUENT SHOULD I USE THIS PRODUCT?
settings.answer:
• Week 1&2: Treat every other day
  • Week 3&4: Treat twice per week
  • After the initial treatment phase (12 weekly treatments), treat the target area to maintain results once a month, or as required.

Skincare after treatment
After hair removal, it is recommended to apply body lotion or cold compress gel for skin care. Do not use skin care products containing alcohol. Do not expose treated areas to the sun. Wait at least 7 days after treatment before exposing treated skin to direct sunlight.

settings.title: WHEN CAN I SEE THE EFFECTS, AND IS IT PERMANENT?
settings.answer:
Most customers start to see evident hair reduction after 3-4 weeks. With 2-3 treatment per week, the effect becomes completely evident after 12 weeks. After each treatment, hair will grow much more sparsely and thinly. Eventually, hair reduction becomes permanent. To maintain the skin’s smoothness, you need to do 1 treatment every 2 to 3 months or as required. Both the outcome and frequency of treatment are different case by case.
According to FDA’s regulations, permanent hair removal means ‘continued and steady reduction of hair over a prolonged period’, which we provide, though some may interpret the term ‘permanent’ differently. Please know that even the photo-therapy used in clinics is not entirely permanent.

settings.title: WHAT IS THE AGE RANGE SUITED FOR IPL HAIR REMOVAL?
settings.answer: We would generally recommend the age range for IPL-use to be 15 and above, and this is because body hair becomes mature at this age. Some follicles mature at a younger age. Therefore whether or not to use IPL will depend on the user. We recommend anyone under 18 gain approval from their parents or have consulted a specialist (cosmetician or dermatologist) before using our products.
